revision.text:
{{codepointer|Weapon attack|r=Hexen}}'''A_CStaffCheck'''
(no parameters)
If the target is within 96 units, this deals a base of 20 damage to the said target, healing the weapon's wielder with the amount of damage that was dealt, also putting weapon into the Drain state.
This codepointer is restricted to [[Classes:CWeapStaff|CWeapStaff]] and derived classes.
